conversations.content: Perform the following tasks in the order they are given: 1. How many appointments do I have on May 15th, 2024? Please give me a summary of the description for each appointment. 2. Am I free for lunch at 12:00 on 2024-05-19? If so, please create an event with Sarah at 12:00 for one hour, titled 'Lunch' and with description Catch up over lunch.. Her email address is 'sarah.connor@gmail.com'.

<function_thought>
To begin, the first task is to check how many appointments Emma has on May 15th, 2024, and summarize the descriptions for each appointment. I will use the function `get_day_calendar_events` with the specified date to retrieve the appointments. This will provide the necessary information for the first part of the user's request.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_day_calendar_events(day="2024-05-15")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
